revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Year twenty-two of Imperator Caesar Titus Aelius Harianus Antoninus Augustus Pius, Phaophi 1. Paid to Heron and his associate collectors of money taxes for Bacchias, by Sibilla, daughter of Dioskoros, for the naudion-tax on catoeci for year twenty-three, 4 obol, for supplementary fees /2 obol, for agio 2 chalkoi, and a fee for the receipt;(2nd hand). Year two of Imperator Caesar Marcus Aurelius Antoninus Augustus and Imperator Caesr Lucius Aurelius Verus Augustus, Mesore 15. Paid to Pemnas and his associate collectors of money taxes for Bacchias, for Sibilla, daughter of Dioskoros, for the naubion-tax on catoeci for year twenty-four, 4 obols, for supplementary fees 1/2 obol, for agio 2 chalkoi, and a fee for the receipt.
